name: Lights Out (itch) (hamzaplayz)
description:
Lights out is a Mind Horror game where you wake up in your basement and you have to beat your nightmares and hallucinations and escape

play as gregg, a guy that has a lot of hallucinations and bad dreams, you must escape your nightmares by finding your bed and defeating your mind

Made for the brackeys game jam 2022.2

Credits:

Code:ItsHamza(me)

Art:Lyof, Dylanvhs

Music:Toma400

Level Design: CrashGyuluka
